name: Dave Binetti for West Ada
description: As a dad of two girls, my kids come first — just like every other parent in West Ada.  As Trustee, I'm dedicated to giving them — and every other student ‐ the best possible public education.

founder.name: Dave Binetti
founder.description: Incumbent candidate for West Ada School District Trustee Zone 4.  Father of two girls in the Distict.  Lives in Eagle.

areaServed.name: West Ada School District Zone 4
areaServed.description: West Ada School District Zone 4, serving Eagle, Star, and parts of Meridian and Garden City
